description.plain: Nicholas Jerry “Nick” Jonas (born September 16, 1992) is an American singer, songwriter, and actor, best known as one of the Jonas Brothers, a pop-rock band he formed with his brothers Kevin and Joe.

body.plain: Nicholas Jerry “Nick” Jonas (born September 16, 1992) is an American singer, songwriter, and actor, best known as one of the Jonas Brothers, a pop-rock band he formed with his brothers Kevin and Joe.

songs.title: Jealous

description.plain:
“Jealous” is a song by American recording artist Nick Jonas for his second studio album. The song was released as the second single from the album following the lead single “Chains”.

Jonas has described the song as a song about when someone is checking out your girl and you’re out, and it’s that whole experience I think a lot of men relate to, but don’t actually talk about.

The time and place in which he was writing and recording this song also played an interesting role, as he was training for Kingdom. It’s pretty safe to imply that he was “hyped up on testosterone” while writing it.

songs.embed_content: Read “Jealous” by Nick Jonas on Genius

I still get jealous

And everybody wants a taste
That's why (That's why)
I still get jealous
'Cause you're too sexy beautiful
And everybody wants a taste
That's why (That's why)
I still get jealous

[Verse 2]
I wish you didn't have to post it all
I wish you'd save a little bit just for me
Protective or possessive? Girl
Call it passive or aggressive

[Pre-Chorus]
I turn my chin music up
And I'm puffin' my chest
I'm gettin' red in the face
You can call me obsessed
It’s not your fault that they hover
I mean no disrespect
It's my right to be hellish
I still get jealous

'Cause you're too sexy beautiful
And everybody wants a taste
That's why (That's why)
I still get jealous
'Cause you're too sexy beautiful
And everybody wants a taste
That's why (That's why)
I still get jealous (Jealous, jealous)

[Bridge]
We're the only ones invited (Invited)

'Cause you know I get excited, yeah
When you get jealous, too

[Pre-Chorus]
I turn my chin music up
And I'm puffin' my chest
I'm turnin' red in the face
You can call me obsessed
It's not your fault that they hover
I mean no disrespect

I still get jealous
[Chorus]

And everybody wants a taste
That's why (That's why, that's why)
I still get jealous (I get jealous)
'Cause you're too sexy beautiful (You get jealous)

That's why (That's why, that's why)
I still get jealous (Jealous)

[Outro]
Oh (Oh), that's why
I still get jealous (Jealous, jealous)
Oh (Oh), that's why
I still get jealous (Jealous, jealous, jealous)153Embed

songs.full_title: Close by Nick Jonas (Ft. Tove Lo)
songs.title: Close

description.plain:
Close is the lead single from Nick Jonas third studio album and features Swedish pop artist Tove Lo. He tweeted about his creative conceit for the song the day before it dropped:

https://twitter.com/nickjonas/status/712911546947649536?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw

This track and its sultry music video show Nick’s moving past the squeaky clean image of his Jonas Brothers days. For the first time in Nick’s highly regulated celebrity life, he’s solo. Besides experiencing the biggest break up of his life, he’s been the subject of celebrity gossip, played a gay MMA fighter on a TV show, and announced his own record label with his BFF, Demi Lovato. He’s stepping into adulthood and new artistic territory, and this song represents a step further in that trajectory.

Nick Jonas and Swedish singer-songwriter Tove Lo were friends. After performing at the Jingle Ball, Nick reached out and she hopped on the song. Tove told EW:

I’ve known Nick as a friend for a couple of years, and working with him was amazing. He’s very talented and I fell in love with the song as soon as I heard the demo.

This track has a roster of veteran pop-makers including songwriting credits from Tove,  Julia Michaels and Justin Tranter, and Swedish production duo Mattman and Robin (who also produced the track).

On March 21st, Nick sent out a video teaser for the song. The official video for the song was released on March 25, 2016. Describing it to Ryan Seacrest, he said: “I actually was just texting Tove—look, there’s gonna be some babies made to this song and they better be named after us.”

songs.title: Introducing Me

description.plain:
Written for “Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam”, “Introducing Me” is about Nick Jonas' character Nate Gray, not opening up to the girl he likes (Chloe Bridges' Dana).

In an attempt to open up to her more and get her to fall in love with him, Jonas serenades here with a song that is a list of everything that no one knows about him, even going more in depth than she may have wanted.

songs.embed_content: Read “Introducing Me” by Nick Jonas on Genius

songs.lyrics:
39 ContributorsIntroducing Me Lyrics[Verse 1]
I'm, I'm good at wastin' time
I think lyrics need to rhyme and you're not askin'
But I'm tryin' to grow a mustache
I eat cheese, but only on pizza, please
And sometimes on a homemade quesadilla
Otherwise, it smells like feet to me
And I, I really like it when the moon looks like a toenail
And I love it when you say my name

[Chorus]
If you wanna know, here it goes
Gonna tell you there's a part of me that shows if we're close
Gonna let you see everything
But remember that you asked for it
I'll try to do my best to impress
But it's easier to let you take a guess at the rest
But you wanna hear what lives in my brain and my heart
Well, you asked for it
For your perusin', at times confusin'
Slightly amusin', introducing me
[Post-Chorus]
Do-do, do-do-do-do-do
Do-do, do-do-do-do-do
La-da-da-da
La-da-da-da-da-da-da-da, da

[Verse 2]
I never trust a dog to watch my food
And I like to use the word "dude"
As a noun or an adverb or an adjective
And I, I never really been into cars
I like really cool guitars and superheroes
And checks with lots of zeros on 'em
I love the sound of violins
And makin' someone smile

[Chorus]
If you wanna know, here it goes
Gonna tell you there's a part of me that shows if we're close
Gonna let you see everything
But remember that you asked for it
I'll try to do my best to impress
But it's easier to let you take a guess at the rest
But you wanna hear what lives in my brain and my heart
Well, you asked for it
For your perusin', at times confusin'
Possibly amusin', introducing me
You might also like[Bridge]
Well, you probably know more than you ever wanted to
So be careful when you ask next time

[Chorus]
So, if you wanna know, here it goes
Gonna tell you there's a part of me that shows if we're close
Gonna let you see everything
But remember that you asked for it
I'll try to do my best to impress
But it's easier to let you take a guess at the rest
But you wanna hear what lives in my brain and my heart
Well, you asked for it
For your perusin', at times confusin'
Hopefully amusin', introducing me

[Post-Chorus]
Do-do, do-do-do-do-do
Do-do, do-do-do-do-do
Do-do-do-do

[Outro]
Introducing me16Embed
